title: Why I'm Leaving Forever
body:
This game is so much fun but hosts the worst people I have ever met on the face of the earth.

I have had nothing but garbage experiences with 99% of the players in this game and no matter what you do its always a general "well then we dont want you here" response. I have run about 3 accounts, all silvers and higher, one of which i spent this year working my backside off to get into silver5 (dj wildcard) and the others i placed higher or ended up in easy starting games with mostly afk enemies. GG.

If you say anything at all to your team there is about a 20% chance someone will afk or rage out or flag you for something.
If you say anything about someone elses gameplay it goes directly into an argument about how toxic you are for giving advice.
If you say anything at all in this game anywhere to anyone of the community it quickly gets flamed with "well your garbage" or "YOU CANT SPELL OMFG GG TILT THROW"

I've been chat banned on my (DJ WILDCARD) account maybe 7 or 8 times now and this last one was from a group of kids who were demanding that they could get me chat banned because i didnt help them in a 1v5. I was like "well your trash so i dont care" and they actually did.

I am actually chat banned from a group of kids who were cussing at me and all reported me after game. They didn't care what I had to say, they didn't care that they were swearing at me, nothing mattered except the fact that they had enough people and went "ENEMY TEAM REPORT SWAIN FOR TOXIC A F"

so here i am, done.

I'm a professional DJ and gamer and I will no longer play this game.
I will no longer support anything to do with riot games or league of legends.

There is honestly nothing you can do except note the number of people that immediately flame my post.

I have made 1 other post in the past and it was "hey i play vlad and zed, id like to play with a team of 5, here is my gameplay video"

my response to that was insane:

 - your combos are complete trash and you know nothing at all about playing that character
 - your cs is so garbage that nobody would ever want to play with you (even though its at 200 and im 20-0)
 - you are so stupid for dashing backwards one of the times at around 7 minutes
 - you need to learn your champion because obviously you dont know wtf ur doing
 - YOU ONLY DID GOOD BECAUSE EVERYONE ELSE IS GARBAGE

I have never felt so sick of a gaming community before in my life.

I run clans on Diablo, call of duty, rocket league, minecraft, runescape, guild wars, helbreath (nemesis & legion), and blade and soul, and cabal 2.


THIS GAME IS FULL OF THE WORST PEOPLE I HAVE EVER WASTED TIME WITH. I AM HAPPY TO SAY I WILL NEVER READ THE REPLIES TO THIS.

THANKYOU ALL FOR MAKING THIS GAME SO TOXIC AND BUTHURT THAT THE REPORT SYSTEM IS ABOUT 1/3 OF THE GAMEPLAY FOCUS.

{{champion:238}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:33}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3075}}

You can swear, but just not at others. The moment that you start swearing and cussing others out is when you can be punished for verbal harassment/abuse. From the [Tribunal FAQ](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2411284): 

>**What's the point of having a language filter if I can get banned for 'adult' language?**
We aren't out to punish players who use adult language; in fact, very few players are ever banned for saying stuff like "f***, I missed that skill shot" or "damn, f***ing close game!" However, the language filter is not an excuse to verbally abuse someone in the game. When you verbally abuse or harass someone by calling them "f***ing ******" or "n*gger noob", that's when you've crossed the line and will be punished by the Tribunal. I've said this before and I'll say it again, we aren't trying to clean online games of adult language; we're trying to reform or get rid of jerks who like to verbally abuse and harass other players.

>**Why is verbal abuse punishable if there is a mute button/language filter?**
Players shouldnât need to rely on features like the mute button or language filter to engage with other players in positive ways. When a player verbally abuses another player and forces him to use the mute button, they have already created a negative experience for that player.

Also, you aren't punished for just one or two or three "slip-ups", but for consistent negativity instead. If you can't use the chat in a neutral or positive manner then just don't use it at all whatsoever.

P.S. Other people behaving worse than you will never ever excuse your own poor behavior. That will only result in the both of you being punished rather than just the original one raging jerk instead.

P.S.S. Your poll is biased.
